changeName(address,string).details: Changes the name of the member

params._name: The new name of the member

changeOwner(address).details: Changes the owner of the membrane

params._address: The address of the new owner

getSize().details: Retrieves the size of the membrane

returns._0: number of members in the membrane

listMembers().details: Retrieves the index of  members in the membrane

returns._0: list of the address of the members

listParents().details: Retrieves the list of parents of the membrane

returns._0: the address of the parents of the membrane

setManifest(string).details: Sets the hash of the latest IPFS manifest for this holon

params._IPFSHash: The hash of the IPFS manifest

changeName(address,string).notice: only the lead can call this function

changeOwner(address).notice: only the owner can call this function

newHolon(string,string,uint256).notice: Constructor to create an holon  created the Holon contract, the factory needs to be deployed first

setManifest(string).notice: Only the holon owner can change this!
